item.title: Foot Surgery
item.description: I have had foot surgery. I’m lying in bed now, with my foot on a pillow, recovering. I delayed the surgery for a long time, over a year. In addition to putting off important work, I also put off fixing my body. I’ve tried to write here why it took so long for me to make the decision. A year ago my left foot was been giving me problems. It would hurt for a few days, then get better.
